text: I am experiencing the same issue since a couple of days. Have you found a solution yet?
<@U074S63BC06>, this turned out to be a bug in the react component of the HubSpot editor. HubSpot engineers pushed a fix and it resolved this error. Are you still experiencing it?
No, it´s working again. Thak you :slightly_smiling_face:

<@U030KE424RY> - quick correction:

Just found out that if you're using {{ module.rich_text }} in your module it will be editable through the side bar only.
But if you're using the whole snippet like {% inline rich_text .... value="{{module.rich_text }} "%} it is editable directly without the sidebar
